root.name: Lore: Aftermath
root.description: OverviewIn Lore: Aftermath, players control s (MAVs) in arenas consisting of standard multiplayer game-modes such as Deathmatch and Team Deathmatch, and Mini Nuke where players try to place a nuke inside the enemies base. Players can either select pre-configured MAVs, or use the MAV Lab which allows players to create their own custom aesthetic and weapons changes.Lore: Aftermath supports up to 8 players on user-hosted servers, while dedicated servers allow up to 24 players. A Siege mode was scheduled and completed internally which supported up to 32 players, but was never publicly released (NOTE: This mode will be available in standalone release).
